title: The Little Red Hen Finds a Wheat Seed
desc: The little red hen finds a wheat seed and asks her friends to help plant it, but no one agrees to help.
prompt_en: Imagine you are the little red hen who found a wheat seed. How would you ask your friends to help you plant it? What reasons might they give for not helping?
prompt_zh: 想像你是發現小麥種子的紅母雞，你會如何請朋友幫忙種植？他們可能會給出什麼理由不幫忙？
sample_questions: Why do you think the friends refused to help plant the seed?
How would you feel if you were the little red hen?
What could the little red hen do to encourage her friends to help?

title: Planting and Weeding Alone
desc: The little red hen plants and weeds the wheat seed all by herself because her friends refuse to help.
prompt_en: Describe the challenges the little red hen faces when planting and weeding alone. How does she stay motivated despite no help?
prompt_zh: 描述紅母雞獨自種植和除草時遇到的困難。她在沒有幫助的情況下如何保持動力？
sample_questions: What does this story teach us about responsibility?
Have you ever done something important all by yourself?
Why is it important to take care of plants like wheat?

title: Harvesting and Threshing the Wheat
desc: When the wheat is ready to harvest, the little red hen asks her friends to help thresh it, but they all refuse again.
prompt_en: Imagine you are the little red hen harvesting wheat alone. How would you feel? What would you say to your friends who refused to help?
prompt_zh: 想像你是獨自收割小麥的紅母雞，你會有什麼感受？你會對不幫忙的朋友說什麼？
sample_questions: Why do you think the friends keep refusing to help?
How important is teamwork in farming?

title: Grinding Wheat into Flour
desc: The little red hen grinds the wheat into flour by herself after her friends refuse to help once more.
prompt_en: Explain the process of grinding wheat into flour. Why is it important that the little red hen does this step herself?
prompt_zh: 說明將小麥磨成麵粉的過程。為什麼紅母雞必須自己完成這個步驟很重要？
sample_questions: What tools might the little red hen use to grind wheat?
How does grinding wheat help make bread?
Why do you think the friends avoid helping at this stage?

title: Baking Bread and Sharing the Reward
desc: The little red hen bakes the bread alone and decides to keep the bread for herself since no one helped her.
prompt_en: Discuss the idea of fairness in this story. Should the little red hen share the bread with her friends? Why or why not?
prompt_zh: 討論故事中的公平觀念。紅母雞應該和朋友分享麵包嗎？為什麼？
sample_questions: What lesson does the little red hen teach about hard work?
Have you ever earned a reward after working hard?
How would you feel if you were one of the friends who didn’t help?
